title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre eager to tackle anything or anyone standing in your way today. You can muster sufficient confidence and readiness to execute a substantial task while action-oriented Mars fuels ruthless Pluto in your sign. But watch out for your uncharacteristic tendency to react impulsively now or you may target the wrong obstacles. Find a simple solution rather than wasting resources to wrestle down a problem with more energy than required. Pacing yourself gives you the stamina to strive for the success you seek. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
